{"id":"b4b35a2f-92cc-4f39-aee6-63ebcd1006da","name":"[TextContent(type=text, text= bc/app/templates/base.html ```html:bc/app/templates/base.html menu ``` add other link to menu )]","timestamp":1747733694502,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":" bc/app/templates/base.html ```html:bc/app/templates/base.html menu ``` add other link to menu "}]},{"role":"assistant","content":[{"type":"thinking","thinking":"The user wants to add links to the menu in the base.html file.   • ` element inside it. I should add more `

Since this appears to be a blockchain application (based on the directory name 'bc' and the presence of an account address), typical links might include: 1. Home 2. Transactions 3. Blocks 4. Wallet 5. Settings However, since the user didn't specify which links to add, I'll add some common ones that would make sense for a blockchain application. I'll edit the file to add these links, maintaining the existing styling and design patterns.","signature":"EqoBCkgIAxABGAIiQPg8Vse7wDYrod/BE7wbrc7SqerJ8Yi45cJmcGppXiuXNkwnFvOxuVXYljoZqkmWxryaH+B43twZ1zQfZmdPT80SDGFM3OQ6nz+APnzYkxoMKtUkm7h03pEzBLj4IjAf+/bQ3ELWtrDuu8nyKN1jk6B6xTgD1OFbbWLfCPp52w+CWVWYwtbiL3NkUL+qMCQqEHqZlm31RgC8u1718jwZl0U="},{"type":"text","text":"I'll add some navigation links to your menu."}],"tool_calls":[{"id":"toolu_bdrk_01MsFV4BWjwYvD6CfEVKdF4L","type":"function","function":{"name":"edit_file","arguments":"{"target_file": "bc/app/templates/base.html", "instructions": "I'm adding navigation links to the menu while preserving the existing address display.", "code_edit": "@@ ... @@\n\n \n {% block title %}{% endblock %}\n \n \n \n
